sentences.english: Have you ever seen in a group of people in the theatre to an audience that crosstalk?
sentences.chinese: 你可曾看到德云社一群人在剧场里给一位观众说相声？

sentences.english: In the comic dialogue, two performers revealed the joke suddenly, which made the audience convulse with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 相声演员不时抖包袱，令现场观众捧腹大笑。

sentences.english: She is a famous comedienne here.
sentences.chinese: 她是这里有名的单口相声家。

sentences.english: Almost every Chinese likes to listen to cross talks.
sentences.chinese: 几乎每一个中国人都爱听相声。

sentences.english: In this thesis relevance theory is used to analyze the humor in Chinese cross talk .
sentences.chinese: 在本论文中，关联理论被用来分析中国相声中的幽默。

sentences.english: The crosstalk (comic dialogue) is the main form of public entertainment in China.
sentences.chinese: 相声小品是我国大众娱乐的主要形式。

sentences.english: The cross-talk, I think, was both interesting and instructive.
sentences.chinese: 相声，我觉得，既有趣又能教育人。

sentences.english: I learned crosstalk from Mr. Zhou Deshan for three years.
sentences.chinese: 我学到的相声，从周先生山为三年。

sentences.english: Typical for China is the crosstalk show.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，典型的喜剧形式是相声表演。

sentences.english: Crosstalk comedian Guo Degang makes a cameo appearance in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 相声演员郭德纲也在片中客串了一个片段。

sentences.english: Throughout cross talk’s history, performers have come from humble backgrounds.
sentences.chinese: 在整个相声的发展历史当中，表演者多数出身卑微。

sentences.english: At the get-together, several boys in our class performed a group crosstalk.
sentences.chinese: 联欢会上，我们班的几个男生说了一段群口相声。

sentences.english: Stand-up comedy is very popular with the public.
sentences.chinese: 对口相声是深受人们喜爱的表演形式。

sentences.english: He started to perform on stage since1960 and was deeply loved by Chinese and foreign audience.
sentences.chinese: 1960年开始登台表演相声，深受中外观众的喜爱。

sentences.english: Their humorous crosstalk was a great complement to the New Year Celebration.
sentences.chinese: 他们的幽默的相声为新年庆典增添了不少趣味。
